divs: Sighting DetailsMy backyard about 6:10 pm (EST) I wanted to mow the lawn so I moved my two cars. I happened to look up (something told me to) and I saw the object. I watched it hover (about 300-800) feet of the ground. It stayed their for 15 seconds like that. Then It started moving Northbound slowly. I looked away, and it was gone. It gave me the creeps. No one beleives me. It looked sort of like this...
